post_title: An art aims, above all, at producing something beautiful which affects not our feelings but the org
post_content:
An art aims, above all, at producing something beautiful which affects not our feelings but the organ of pure contemplation, our imagination.
Eduard Hanslick
#imagination

post_title: Yes, peace can and must be won, to save the world from the terrible destruction of World War III.
